API hosted on - https://valhalla.openmaps.live

For endpoints description refer to - https://valhalla.github.io/valhalla/api/

Example test - GET https://valhalla.openmaps.live/isochrone?json={"locations":[{"lat":28.6328,"lon":77.2188 }],"costing":"pedestrian","contours":[{"time":15.0,"color":"ff0000"}]}&id=Walk_From_Office
